message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique and high-quality item that I think you'll really love.
I'm really interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $60.
I understand that $200 is a bit steep, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. How about we try $160?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but $160 is still a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
I'm still willing to negotiate, but I need to make sure I get a fair price for the product. How about we try $140?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit stretched on the budget. I'm willing to pay $90 for the product, can you meet me at this price?
I'm not willing to go as low as $90, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we try $130?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $130 is still a bit too high. I'm willing to pay $100 for the product, can you meet me at this price?
